title: 服务器今天开了一下，别人进不去
author: 卡德大大
txt_content:
为什么进入服务器提示:If you wish to use IP forwarding, please enable it in your BungeeCord config as well!
:(

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
首先打开bungee目录下config.yml 然后找到 ip_forward: false 改成 ip_forward: true
其次如果服务器核心是Spigot的话修改spigot.yml，将bungeecord: false改成 bungeecord: true

replies.author: asjwdwan521
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
如果是单服的话把spigot.yml里的bungeecord: true改成 bungeecord: false
再连接这个端口尝试

replies.author: 卡德大大
replies.txt_content:
